messages.passwordUpdateError: An error occurred on update the password
messages.profileUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the profile
messages.demoBusiness: You can not change profile settings as a demo business!

subscription.titleText: If you want to identify the visitors of your restaurants, your bars, etc., just use our identification service. With our service, your visitors don't have to fill out those annoying pieces of paper, they just have to scan your QR code when they check-in. To use our service, you need to choose one of our tiers and book it. If you have any open questions, just send us an email.
subscription.activeSubscription: You have an active subscription to "{{tier}}" until {{until}}
subscription.extendSubscription: If you want to extend your subscription just book your tier again and we will handle the extension of your subscription

alerts.noActiveSubscription: Currently you don't have an active subscription. Please book one of our offers to use our service. Thank you!

home.alertText: Your booked tier will expire within the next {{days}} days. If you want to continue using our service, please extend your booking. Thank you.

charts.notEnoughData: Sorry, we currently do not have enough data to display any statistics.

locations.deleteModalText: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
locations.noLocation: Currently there are no locations. You can add one if you want.

locationDrawer.reachedLimit: You can't add a location because you reached your tiers limit
locationDrawer.demoBusinessAlert: You can not change or create locations as a demo business!

profile.signOutMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out? Currently you are signed in to a location and you will automatically be checked out.

alerts.emailError: An error occured while updating the email
alerts.profileError: Error occured while updating the profile
alerts.demoUserEmail: You can not change emails as a demo user!
alerts.demoUserPassword: You can not change your password as a demo user!
alerts.demoUserData: You can not change your contact data as a demo user!

checkIn.checkingIn: Please wait! We are checking you in...
checkIn.preparingCheckIn: Please wait! We are preparing your check in
checkIn.checkInDescription:
You are currently checked in to a location. We will automatically
            check you out if you leave this location. If you want to do it
            manually you can press the "Check out"-button below. Thanks for your
            visit!

signIn.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up

alerts.verificationSuccessful: Account verification successful. You can sign in to your account now.
alerts.registrationSuccessful: Your registration was successful. You received a mail to confirm your account. Please also check your 'Spam' folder
alerts.validEmail: Please insert a valid email address
alerts.passwordResetSuccessful: If an account with this mail exists, a mail was sent to reset your password

errors.passwordLength: The password should be at least 6 characters long
errors.confirmWeakPassword: Please confirm the usage of a weak password
errors.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address

signUp.weakPassword: Yes, I want to use a weak password
signUp.alreadyAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
